projects.name: Clean contacts
projects.description: This is not a library, this is a sample implementation of Clean architecture in Android. Currently I'm working with this architecture and I think the code becomes well structured, decoupled and maintainable, in summary, it follow the SOLID principles. This is a sample repository that I used in my talk “My way to clean Android”. It has around 60% code coverage and uses Travis CI to run the unit/instrumentation tests
